SELECT * FROM ( SELECT INQUIRY_NO , INQUIRY_TITLE , INQUIRY_CONTENT , REGIST_DATE , USER_ID , REPLY_CONTENT , U.USER_NICKNAME , REPLY_DATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY INQUIRY_NO DESC) as RNUM FROM INQUIRY_BOARD I JOIN USERS U ON (I.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE I.STATUS = 'Y' ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
